responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "57B8DE0044A1B770467154BF6A474839", "These are the halls of our ancestors, our birthright, if you think about it that way. We Nikua aren\'t really for the caves though, we\'ve settled outside the walls for now. Even still, I can\'t abide the idea of my grand-aunt\'s tomb being befouled by some nasty beast, could you? And yes, unfortunately there are some very nasty beasts about. Bet they neglected to mention that little jewel back home, eh?")
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_NPC_GatewatcherNahotu_11_Response
